title: Club wants to edit Single Addendum C as a form including save/cancel
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing a single Add C
custom_steps: WHEN the form is in preliminary or tendered states
custom_expected:
THEN the edit button is available
AND it puts the form in edit mode
AND user can make changes to editable fields, save and cancel

title: Club is able to tender or submit a single addendum C
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as Club
AND User selects a single preliminary addendum C
custom_steps:
WHEN User fufills all required fields and clicks tender
AND Clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN Form changes to Tender
AND Turns into Pending
AND All changes are saved when states are changed
AND All rule checks are ran

title: Club is able to e-sign from a single c form
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as club
AND Goes to a tendered addendum C
custom_steps:
WHEN Users scrolls to bottom of addendum C page
AND Clicks on E-sign button
AND Clicking Submit for e-signature
custom_expected:
THEN E-sign button should appear on bottom 
AND "Are you sure message" appears when e-sign is clicked
AND Generating PDF modal should appear
AND this modal cannot be dismissed
AND this modal has a countdown timer beginning at 35
AND Form appears on player and club e-sig widgets

title: BOC wants to send a single C back for updates
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND user is viewing an Add C in Tendered or Pending Approval states
custom_expected:
THEN user can see a 'Return to Club' option above the Approve button
AND this option puts the Add C back in Preliminary state without running any rule chekcs
AND any attachment with the label 'Addendum C' is deleted
AND the form reloads in view mode

title: BOC wants to approve a single Add C
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND user is viewing a single Add C
AND that Add C is Pending, Tendered or Preliminary
custom_expected:
THEN user can see a blue Approve button to the left of all other buttons
AND it is available in view and edit mode
AND if it is pressed in Edit mode, any changes are saved and the form reloads in view mode
AND all rule checks are run as if from the multi-C widget ([overridable warnings](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/suites/view/1363&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc&group_id=11989) and [hard errors](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/suites/view/1363&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc&group_id=11988))
AND the Add C shows up black in contract history
AND blue notification appears

title: Club/BOC can print an Add C
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as Club/BOC
AND User searches for Add C in any state
custom_steps:
WHEN User finds Add C
AND Opens Add C
AND Goes to bottom of page 
AND dropdown arrow next to E-Sign
AND clicks Print
custom_expected: THEN Adobe printed version of Add C appears with all Add C details

title: Club/BOC can search for an Add C
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to advanced search
AND selects search type
custom_expected:
THEN they can search for Addendum Cs
AND all contract sub-filters are available

title: Using the tender button on selected rows updates those to "tendered"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks edit on a preliminary addendum C's
AND Fufills all required fields with no errors
AND Clicks Tender
custom_expected: THEN Addendum C's moves from Preliminary to Tendered

title: Verify When the 'Enter Salary' button is clicked, a pop-out containing a text box for entering a single salary value will appear.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club
AND can view the Addendum Cs widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User Selects a checkbox on a preliminary or not created addendum C
AND User selects Enter Salary Button
custom_expected: THEN A pop-out containing textbox for entering a single salary value will appear.

title: Verify BOC can save changes to any unapproved addendum C
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into BOC
AND Views addendum C widget
AND Addendum C is not in approved status
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC clicks edit pencil on a addendum C
AND Edits a addendum C
AND Clicks save
custom_expected: THEN any changes made are saved.

title: Verify hitting the approve button moves addendum C to Approved state
custom_preconds:
GIVEN That User is logged in as BOC
AND is viewing addendum c widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks checkbox on a addendum C that is not in "Not Created" or "Approved" state
AND Clicks Approve
custom_expected: THEN Addendum C moves to approved state

title: BOC wants to move an Add C back to Preliminary from the Multi-C widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND is viewing the multi-C widget
custom_steps: WHEN user selects 'Tendered' or 'Pending' Addendum Cs
custom_expected:
THEN user can click 'Return to Club' to the left of the split PDF button
AND the button is not active if other states are selected 
AND the Add Cs will move back to Preliminary status
AND no rule checks are run
AND the Add C attachment is deleted
AND a blue notification is triggered
AND the club receives an action item

title: As Club I want to see progress bar when submitting Add Cs or contracts
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is creating an Add C or contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user bulk submits
custom_expected:
THEN show a progress bar that updates real time, that tells the user how many records have been processed
AND Modal cannot be dismissed
AND This logic should apply to all bulk state change and save actions on Multi C widget (both club and BOC), state change actions on approvals clipboard and approval + stamping action on the MNC verification widget, and club stamping widget
AND show results dialogue box (typically the error message modal)
IF club or BOC stamping fails for any particular form, THEN show error using standard error messaging dialogue for the appropriate players -  "[Addendum C/ Contract] could not be stamped. Please contact BOC"

title: Clicking E-sign will trigger a modal asking the user to confirm if they want to proceed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND that user can view the Add C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a Tendered Add C
AND clicks E-sign
custom_expected:
THEN a modal pops up asking the user if they want to proceed
Wireframe: http://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=submit_add_cs_for_e-signature

title: Verify Club can click on the icon to bring up the PDF for player to e-sign. After this, the club hands the device over to the player
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user can view the Player E-Signatures widget
custom_expected: THEN the e-sign icon is clickable

title: Verify Player is guided by the Adobe echo sign interface. The player will need to be guided to typing their name and drawing their signature.
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user can view the Player E-Signatures widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the e-sign icon
custom_expected: THEN the user is prompted by the Adobe Echosign interface

title: Verify The form now drops off the Player E-signature widget. (Note: The next story makes this an automatic process but for now, its fine to only work on manually refresh)
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has submitted a selected a player for e-signature from the Player E-Signatures widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user completes the process
custom_expected: THEN the player's name will be dropped from the widget

title: Verify that if PDF is withdrawn pen icon reverts to upload icon
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has edited a form in e-sign state
AND saved
AND the warning modal appears
AND the user clicks "Ignore and Continue"
custom_expected: THEN the status icon reverts to the upload icon

title: Verify that if both club and player have signed the Addendum C, the C updates to "Pending".
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that a player has signed his Addendum C
AND that THE club has signed his C
custom_steps: WHEN the user returns to the Add C widget
custom_expected: THEN the status of that form is shown as "Pending"

title: If the stamping was successfully complete, show a notification saying "X document(s) successfully E-Signed" and the form falls off the Club e-signature widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a club has successfully stamped a form
custom_expected:
THEN a notification saying "X documents succesfully E-Signed" appears
AND the form falls off the Club e-signature widget

title: Verify E-Signed PDFs should now appear as a paper clip icon in the attachments column on the Addendum C widget.
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a player and club have e-signed an Add C
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the form in the Add C widget
custom_expected: THEN the PDF appears as a paper clip icon in the attachments column

title: If the stamping was successfully complete, the forms fall off the Club e-signature widget and a notification is shown "x document(s) were successfully E-Signed"
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has e-signed multiple forms
custom_steps: WHEN the user stamps the club signature on them
custom_expected:
THEN the forms fall off the Club E-signature widget
AND a notification appears: "x document(s) were successfully E-Signed"

title: Verify When an addendum C is e-signed and approved, A BOC stamp is included at the bottom of the pdf
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged into BOC
AND User looks for Tendered Addendum Cs
AND sends Addendum C to esign
AND Addendum C is esigned
custom_steps: WHEN BOC checks Uploaded Addendum C from esign
custom_expected: THEN Show BOC stamp at bottom of page that includes "For Commissioners office use only", "Approved and recorded", "By commissioner of Baseball" and the signature "Roy Krasik "designee"

title: Batch Testing
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on multi c widget
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks checkbox on 40 players
AND Clicks Edit
AND Adds value into salarys through enter salary
AND Clicks Save
AND Clicks Tender
AND Clicks E-Sign

*AND User is timing the time it would take for each state change.
custom_expected: THEN Timing is found for each state change for each batch:

title: Auth Signatory - Verify New Apply button saves and closes
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND the user can view the Authorized Signatories and Negotiators widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a row
AND user clicks the "Add" button in the Stored Signature column
AND draws a signature in the signature box
AND user clicks "Save"
custom_expected: THEN the signature box will close and the signature will be saved

title: Salary Structures - Club is able to add multiple rows and Save or Cancel all Changes at once
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user can view the salary structures widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks the "Add Row" button
AND clicks it again
custom_expected:
THEN the user can edit multiple rows
AND hit save or cancel all changes
AND the effect will be applied to all rows

title: User can use advanced search for filter for contracts and add C's
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as Club/BOC
AND Goes to Advanced Search
custom_steps:
WHEN User selects addendum C Search For option
AND selects any filter
AND Clicks Search
custom_expected: THEN Results for filtered addendum C's should appear

title: BOC/Club can view errors/warnings on contracts.
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as BOC/Club
AND When user is looking on contracts
custom_steps:
WHEN User clicks submit terms without filling any information

custom_expected: THEN errors and warnings should appear based on missing information

title: BOC/Club can find a professional player through quick search
custom_steps:
1. WHEN user is club
AND types 3 or more letters into the quick search box 

2. WHEN user is BOC
AND types 3 or more letters into the quick search box
custom_expected:
THEN a scrollable drop down will appear with potential results for professional players
AND it will display their position and Org/Club

title: As club I want to see other clubs contracts terms accepted or higher

custom_steps: WHEN I search for another clubs contract that is Terms Accepted (or higher)
custom_expected:
THEN I am able to view other clubs contracts with this state
AND these contracts are in green font in contract history
AND only close button is available

custom_steps:
WHEN User selects trash can on attachment
AND User attaches a new pdf
AND Selects Addendum C option
AND Clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN Addendum C is saved
AND Attachment receives new BOC Stamp
AND Original date approved is on new attachment

title: As club I want to filter notifications

custom_steps: WHEN I view the notifications widget
custom_expected:
THEN I can see that seconds has been removed from timestamp
AND Club can filter by Type (multiselect)
AND BOC can also filter by ORG (multiselect)

title: As club I do not want to see Add F/G for MJ players
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the system date for 'begin to create new mnc for following year' is a date into the future
AND I am logged in as a Club
AND I am viewing a player who already has an active MJC for this year
custom_steps: WHEN I open a new MNC for this player
custom_expected:
THEN the sections Add G and F will not be available
AND I cannot add them from 'add sections'

title: As BOC I want players contract to get terminated when he is released
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has an MNC
custom_steps: WHEN the user releases him
custom_expected:
THEN contract is terminated
AND updated with comments/timestamps
AND Add C no longer count for the player but remain approved

title: As BOC I want to see required field errors when I approve a contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is creating a contract
AND the contract contains errors
custom_steps: WHEN the user approves the contract
custom_expected:
THEN errors appear global modal
AND after dismissing modal, errors are pinned to the right
AND fields containing errors are outlined in red

title: As BOC I want to view hard errors when I approve a contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is creating a contract
AND the contract contains hard errors
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks approve
custom_expected:
THEN show error modal
AND after error modal is dismissed, errors are pinned to the right
AND required fields are outlined in red

title: As BOC I want to view Overridable errors when I approve a contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has a contract w/overridable errors
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks approve
custom_expected:
THEN show error modal
AND after modal is dismissed, errors are pinned to the right
AND missing required fields are outlined in red

title: As BOC I want to view Add C warnings when I approve a contract

custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks approve
custom_expected:
THEN show error modal
AND errors pin to the right
AND required field outlined in red

title: As BOC I want players status to be active when I approve his contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is creating a contract for a non-active player
custom_steps: WHEN the user approves the contract
custom_expected:
THEN player's header is updated with status/logo/club/level of play
AND player appears in MN roster widget and counts towards active/under control limit
AND player info appears in roster widget
AND entry in profile appears in black
AND contract date updated

title: As BOC, I want to send a Terms Accepted Contract back to the club for updates
custom_steps: WHEN contract is in Terms Accepted state and BOC selects "Return to Club",
custom_expected:
THEN move the contract state to "Update Terms Accepted"
AND make no changes to player's transactions or roster status
AND contract continues to stay visible to all other clubs (except comments and attachments)
AND show updated buttons in new state as per button table
AND show blue notification "Contract is now Update Terms Accepted"
AND no rule checks run

title: As BOC, I want to send a Pre-approved Contract back to the club for updates
custom_steps: WHEN contract is moved from Pre-approved to Update Terms Accepted
custom_expected: THEN all conditions from [C166720](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/166720&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc&group_id=21642) are met

title: As BOC I want to approve multiple contracts from MNC Ver Wdget

AND is on the MNC verification widget
AND there are multiple contracts ready for approval
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects multiple contracts
AND clicks approve
custom_expected:
THEN contract's status/entry/date is updated
AND contracts are removed from the widget

title: As BOC I can reject and delete a contract
BOC Can approve a contract and player is active on roster

AND already have a contract in terms submitted/accepted state
custom_steps: WHEN I click Approve on the players contract
custom_expected:
THEN the contract updates to approved
AND player can be found on roster for the club he is signed to

title: BOC wants to add secret notes to a contract

custom_steps: WHEN I open a contract [in any state]
custom_expected:
THEN I can view and edit a field called BOC notes on the contract
AND Club cannot see or edit this field

AND Attachment opens attached contract PDF

title: As BOC I want to return a terms submitted to a club

GIVEN I am logged in as BOC

custom_expected:
THEN the contract is moved back to PRELIM
AND a blue success notif shows that contract has been moved back to preliminary
AND Contract history shows contract in red
AND contract falls off approvals clipboard
AND status header is updated

title: BOC can approve a contract from the MNC verf. widget

custom_steps: WHEN I click approve for one or more contracts from MNC Verification WIdget
custom_expected:
THEN the contracts are successfulyl approved
AND contracts move off the widget

title: As BOC I want to reject a Pre Approved contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has a submitted pre approved contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user rejects the contract
custom_expected:
THEN status/header/date is updated
AND contract is removed from clipboard
AND profile entry updated and in black
AND contract reloads in view mode
AND blue notification populates
AND contract is still fully editable to BOC
AND contract is visible to other clubs except attachments/comments

title: As BOC I can delete a rejected or withdrawn contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is viewing a rejected/withdrawn contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the delete button
custom_expected:
THEN show confirmation message
AND entry is removed from history

title: As BOC I want to withdraw a TA contract

custom_steps: WHEN the user moves the contract to a withdrawn state
custom_expected:
THEN show blue notification
AND history entry is updated
AND contract's status/comments/date is updated

title: As BOC I want to void a contract

GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
and I am viewing an approved contract
custom_steps:

AND I enter reason/comments for voiding
(AND I override warnings/errors if there are any)
custom_expected:
THen the contract status updates to Voided
AND the last updated by/time updates
AND contract reloads in view mode

title: As a club/BOC, I want to see Contract years remaining on Add Cs
As BOC, I want to set up and edit signatories on behalf of club *
As BOC I can accept terms on a contract from clipboard

GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
AND have selected one or more Terms Submitted contract from the clipboard
AND the 'accept terms' button has been activated
custom_steps: WHEN I click Accept terms button
custom_expected:
THEN [linked story] rule checks are run
AND contracts are updated to Terms Accepted
AND contracts stay on the clipboard with updated status change

title: As BOC I can edit the contract on behalf of the club
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN I view a contract in any of these states [Preliminary, Terms Submitted, terms accepted]
custom_expected:
THEN I can edit and save the following information -
-Add Sections/Addendums to the contract in all states
-Add contract attachment in prelim
-Change or update signatory
-Change signing date (which should reflect on player history and contract history tabs)
-Edit ORG in Add A

title: As BOC, I want to reattach and re-stamp a PDF to an approved Contract

AND Labels contract

title: Club users can find a domestic amateur player through quick search and create a 1st year contract

1. WHEN club performs a quick search for a domestic amateur player drafted by their club
AND clicks on their profile
AND creates a new minor contract from the create new button in their profile header

2. WHEN club performs a quick search for a domestic amateur player that was passed over
AND clicks on their profile
AND creates a new minor contract from the create new button in their profile header
custom_expected: THEN a new contract is created for the club and opens in preliminary mode

AND the form is reloaded in view mode
AND blue notification appears after successfully updated

AND 'Status Last changed, Changed by, Date Submitted and Submitted by' fields in the Status and Dates section are updated

title: Club can print Life Insurance section

custom_steps:

title: Club can print the execution page of the contract
custom_preconds:
Link to Template: https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2347096?projectId=14044
Link to Sample: https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2347185?projectId=14044
Link to Report details: https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2347095?projectId=14044
custom_steps: WHEN user hits Print
custom_expected:
THEN all behavior listed in Report Details for Execution of Contract should be met except for any E-sig related notes, parental consent and commissioners stamping
AND data on printed Execution of Contract should match with what was entered into EBIS.
AND the Execution of Contract should be laid out as shown in the template.
AND any fields not yet filled out in ebis should just print blank on the PDF
AND ff English only, then it should fit on one page.  
AND there should be space left for Commissioner's stamp section at the bottom of the page.
AND any changes made to the contract by club/BOC any state should reflect the changes in the PDF when you hit PRINT again

title: Club can print Addendum B of contract

THEN Add B should generate and print as it was entered into EBIS
AND it should show the header and footer and follow the template

1. THEN add a page break after the footer "No Other Provisions"

title: Clubs want to print a contract with Addendum C data
custom_preconds: Given that club is viewing a contract with Addendum C data
custom_steps: When club clicks print
custom_expected: THEN the contract will print with Addendum C data populated

title: Club can print Addendum A of contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user fills out an Addendum A
AND user clicks 'print'
custom_expected:
THEN Addendum A should generate and print as it was entered into EBIS
AND all behavior listed in the Report Details should be met
AND the layout follows the template
AND fields not yet filled out should print blank

title: Club/BOC can print english and spanish version of assignment clause
As a club, I want only limited users to have permissions to create and edit stored e-signatures (read-only)
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged as a read only club with esig permissions
custom_steps: WHEN I view Esign
custom_expected:
THEN Read only e-sig users can see the Player, club and Authorized signatory widget but do not have access to any buttons. Checkboxes are not visible
AND Read only e-sig users cannot see E-sign button on forms
AND Read only e-sig users cannot see the "new" button on transactions, contracts and Add C forms next to the Authorized signatory field

title: As a club, I want only limited users to have permissions to create and edit stored e-signatures (admin)
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as a club with admin esign permissions
custom_steps: WHEN I view Esign
custom_expected: THEN I have access to all e-sig functionality including player and club e-sig widgets, e-sig buttons on forms, the Authorized signatory widget and the "new" option on forms

title: As a club, I want to give some users read only access to Minor league contracts
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a user with Club MNC Viewer perms
custom_steps: WHEN user views ebis
custom_expected:
THEN the user can view MNC widgets and records but has no edit or state change functionality
AND on contract forms and Addendum C forms, the Edit button, all state change buttons, and E-sign button are not visible. The Print and close buttons continue to stay visible and usable
AND user can view Contract History on player profile but does not have access to Create New button
AND on the Add C widget and Salary structure widget, read only users can see the results but have no buttons. All checkbox selection fields are also hidden
AND user can use MNC advanced search
AND user can receive MNC related notifications and can delete their own notifications (notifications are account specific)
AND E-sig and authorized signatory functions work as they do for admin-cin-all

title: As BOC, I want to give read only access to some users to Minor league contracts
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as BOC read only account
custom_steps: WHEN I login with this account
custom_expected:
THEN I can do the following -
-View MNC widgets but cannot edit anything
-Viewing contracts and Add C's, only print and close buttons available
-Can veiw contract history but NO create new button
-Can see approvals widget but no buttons
-Can receieve notifications
-Cannot see esign or auth sig widget YET

title: As BOC, I want some users to have read-only access to the MNC verification widget
custom_preconds: read-boc-verf / summer733
